blogPost.excerpt: Built from the ground up for performance. A powerful AI engine for generating copy to drive conversions. Generate or improve your own ideas for ads, social posts, email subject lines and landing pages.
blogPost.body: Built from the ground up for performance. A powerful AI engine for generating copy to drive conversions. Generate or improve your own ideas for ads, social posts, email subject lines and landing pages.
blogPost.title: Anyword - Write your copy with an AI trained on $250M of ads
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 从底层构建的性能。强大的人工智能引擎，用于生成文案以促进转化。生成或改进您自己的广告、社交帖子、电子邮件主题行和登陆页面的想法。
localize.tagline: 用受过2.5亿美元广告训练的人工智能来写你的文案。

localize.description: 從底層構建的性能。強大的人工智能引擎，用於生成文案以促進轉化。生成或改進您自己的廣告、社交帖子、電子郵件主題行和登陸頁面的想法。
localize.tagline: 用受過2.5億美元廣告訓練的人工智能來寫你的文案。

previous.excerpt: Google Analytics meets intelligent algorithms: find hidden conversion opportunities in your Google Analytics data. A tool that analyzes your data and shows exactly how to improve your conversion rates. Offers audits and 24/7 monitoring of Google Analytics.
previous.title: Convertmind - Google analytics monitoring & audits to increase conversions

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics数据中找到隐藏的转化机会。一个分析您的数据并准确显示如何提高您的转化率的工具。提供对Google Analytics的审计和24/7监控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析监测和审计，以提高转换率。

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics數據中找到隱藏的轉化機會。一個分析您的數據並準確顯示如何提高您的轉化率的工具。提供對Google Analytics的審計和24/7監控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析監測和審計，以提高轉換率。

next.excerpt: AI Conversation Flow is a powerful virtual email conversation builder to help marketing teams convert neglected leads into sales-ready hand-raisers.

localize.description: AI Conversation Flow是一个强大的虚拟电子邮件对话构建器，帮助营销团队将被忽视的潜在客户转化为销售准备好的举手之劳。
localize.tagline: 建立基于意图的线索转化活动的新方法

localize.description: AI Conversation Flow是一個強大的虛擬電子郵件對話構建器，幫助營銷團隊將被忽視的潛在客戶轉化爲銷售準備好的舉手之勞。
localize.tagline: 建立基於意圖的線索轉化活動的新方法
